data.description: Offset accounts, early repayments and free redraw, the Flexible Home Loan gives you plenty of options to tinker with.
data.name: Flexible Home Loan

eligibility.additionalInfo: Home loan applications are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval.

eligibility.additionalValue: A citizen or permanent resident of Australia or a citizen of New Zealand that is permanently residing in Australia and employed (where applicable) in Australia.

features.additionalInfo: Free redraws on variable home loans if you're ahead on payments (minimum $500).
Offset account. Let your savings reduce your interest with a 100% offset account.
Pay interest-only. You can pay just the interest for up to 5 years on a home you'll live in, and request up to an additional 5 years if it's an investment property.
Repayment holiday. Apply to take a break from repayments when the unexpected happens, if you're ahead on your repayments.
Rate lock. You can add a rate lock option to your fixed home loan application for $500 which lets you hedge against rates rising before the settlement date.
Fix or split. There is no fee to fix or split your loan.

To receive $2K cashback offer, apply from 8 September 2023 and settle within 120 days of the loan application date.  Switch your existing home loan from another lender. Take out a home loan with a minimum size of $400k and maximum LVR of 80%.

To receive $3K cashback offer, apply from 8 September 2023 and settle within 120 days of the loan application date.  Switch your existing home loan from another lender. Take out a home loan with a minimum size of $700k and maximum LVR of 80%.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a valuation is needed, this fee is charged per property and covers some of our cost.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a valuation is needed, this fee is charged per property and covers some of our cost.

fees.name: Agent fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at or before settlement if our external solicitors are required to instruct an agent to conduct settlement (e.g. if in a rural area)

fees.name: Settlement fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee (currently $250) covers some of the costs associated with establishing and settling your home loan. This fee is payable at settlement.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges. Differ by state.

fees.name: Rate lock fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you elect to lock in a fixed interest rate.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when the loan amount is greater than 80% of the property's value.

fees.name: Top up fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you top-up your home loan.

fees.name: Security substitution fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we approve a request to substitute the security property for another property.

fees.name: Bank cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we provide you with a bank cheque, repurchase a bank cheque or replace a bank cheque.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request us to make a payment for you via Telegraphic Transfer.

fees.name: Production of title fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to produce the title to the security property.

fees.name: Arrears fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the fifth day after: a loan facility has missed a scheduled payment and fallen into arrears, and/or; each month (or every four weeks if your payment frequency is weekly or fortnightly) that the loan remains in arrears.

fees.name: Security discharge preparation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on discharge of a mortgage. Charged per property.

fees.name: Prepayment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we incur a loss due to the early termination of a fixed interest rate period.

fees.name: Search fees
fees.additionalInfo: It may be necessary to conduct title or instrument searches or property enquiries. If so, you must pay us at or before settlement the actual cost incurred for such searches or enquiries.

fees.name: Consent to a dealing fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we consent to a dealing with a property.

fees.name: Subdivision approval valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Subdivision approval valuation fee. Cost varies.
